main event: A witness observed a luminous white, brilliant, round object that rapidly ascended into the clouds in Marietta, Ohio in 1964.
interesting points: The object appeared suddenly over the horizon and was silent as it ascended.
The object moved in front of and behind clouds at times.
The witness described the object as quite small and rapidly ascending.
The witness had seen similar objects in the same area on two previous occasions.
The witness reported the sighting to the Air Force.
